title: Context-Based Scientific Information Literacy Simulation Training

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: VR simulation environment focused on improving current practitioners' ability to utilize scientific information for solving public health issues

learning_goals: Over 80% of learners demonstrate the ability to critically evaluate credible scientific information in real public health scenarios.
Over 75% of learners demonstrate the ability to perform effective decision-making by applying information retrieval strategies in VR simulation environments.
Over 90% of learners submit and are evaluated on portfolios showcasing practical applications of scientific information literacy through team-based projects.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
